pullrequest.title: Fix missing shadows and normal maps when using ogre 1.9

content.raw:
just tested on an ATI machine, lights, shadows, normal maps, lightmaps, camera sensor (w w/out distortion) all working.

Interestingly gpu ray sensor seems to be working slightly better than before - now most of the range values are correct but some are giving 0s.
content.html:
just tested on an ATI machine, lights, shadows, normal maps, lightmaps, camera sensor (w w/out distortion) all working.

Interestingly gpu ray sensor seems to be working slightly better than before - now most of the range values are correct but some are giving 0s.
